Special Powers
CONSTRUCTS: Immediately KO this Construct if it is not within 6 squares of the character that generated it. // Constructs do not block line of fire, do not require opposing characters to break away, and opposing characters don't stop moving when they become adjacent to a Construct. Constructs can't be chosen for Mastermind or have their combat values modified by other characters.
SHINING A LIGHT: FREE: [Improved Targeting: Hindering]. Choose an opposing character within 6 squares and line of fire. The chosen character modifies range and attack -1 when making range attacks until your next turn.

April 23, 2021
pokolo
Hmm, this is a little underwhelming to me actually... the -1 to range and attack is nice but it only effects one chosen character... was hoping for something along the lines of giving friendly characters improved targeting: hindering. It’s also p easy to “kill” and doesn’t have any movement to get into place outside of sidestep so might b difficult to set up.

budweiserclix
I like that all the constructs have a trait that makes it so their combat value can't be modified, but two constructs have powers that modify their combat values. Fantastic!
